casebody.data:
ECKSTEIN v. UNITED STATES. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. March 6, 1906.) No. 150 (3597). Appeal from the Circuit Court of the United States for the Southern District of New York. For decision below, see 140 Fed. 94. Comstock & Washburn (J. Stuart Tompkins, of counsel), for appellant. D. Frank Lloyd, Asst. U. S. Atty.

Before WALLACE, LACOMBE, and COXE, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decision affirmed; approving decision of the Circuit Court, and of the Board of General Appraisers.
